title: Vacation Tracker MVP
description:
# Vacation Tracker MVP

Personal vacation budget and schedule tracker for couples.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- date-fns

## Data Model

### Trip
- id: string (UUID)
- name, destination: string
- start_date, end_date: date
- notes: string | null

### Expense
- id, trip_id: string
- amount: number, currency: string
- category: flights|hotels|food|activities|transport|other
- description: string | null, date: date

### Checklist
- id, trip_id: string
- name: string
- items: ChecklistItem[]

### ChecklistItem
- id, checklist_id: string
- text: string, checked: boolean

## Features
1. Trip Management - Create, edit, delete, list trips
2. Budget Tracking - Categorized expenses with totals
3. Calendar View - Yearly/monthly view with trip blocks
4. Notes & Checklists - Free-form notes, packing lists, to-dos

## Progress
- [x] GitHub repo, Next.js, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, Supabase setup
- [x] Trip list page with create form
- [ ] Trip detail page, Expenses, Calendar, Checklists

title: Build Trip detail page with edit/delete
description: Create trip detail page at /trips/[id] showing trip info, expenses, checklists. Include edit and delete functionality.

title: Build expense tracking with categories
description: Add expense form and list. Categories: flights, hotels, food, activities, transport, other. Show totals by category and trip total.

title: Build calendar view component
description: Create yearly/monthly calendar view showing all vacation dates at a glance. Click trip block to see summary.

title: Build notes and checklists feature
description: Add trip notes (free-form text), packing checklist, and to-do list with checkboxes for each trip.

title: Set up Supabase authentication
description: Implement user authentication using Supabase Auth. Include sign up, sign in, sign out, and password reset flows. Protect routes that require authentication.
close_reason: Implemented Supabase authentication with login, signup, sign out, email verification callback, and middleware route protection

title: Add couple sharing/collaboration
description: Allow two users (a couple) to share and collaborate on trips. Options: shared household/group model, or invite-based sharing. Add user_id to trips and implement Row Level Security (RLS) policies in Supabase.
close_reason: Implemented household-based sharing with RLS policies, setup flow for creating/joining households, and invite partner functionality

title: Build dashboard/home page
description: Create a dashboard showing: upcoming trips, recent trips, total spending summary, and quick-add buttons. This becomes the landing page after login.

title: Add multi-currency support
description: Handle multiple currencies in expenses. Add user's home currency preference, display totals converted to home currency. Consider using a free exchange rate API or static rates.
